title: Understanding Emotional Regulation
text: Emotional regulation is the ability to manage and respond to emotional experiences in a healthy way. It involves being aware of your emotions and using strategies to influence them.

title: Benefits of Good Emotional Regulation
text: Consider how being able to manage your emotions effectively can impact various aspects of your life, such as your relationships, decision-making, and overall well-being.

hintAnswer: increased $$self-awareness$$, improved coping skills, better $$decision-making$$, improved relationships, and reduced risk of relapse
title: Identifying the Outcomes
text: Think about the positive outcomes that result from good emotional regulation. How does it affect your self-awareness, coping skills, and relationships?
choices: increased $$self-awareness$$, improved coping skills, better $$decision-making$$, improved relationships, and reduced risk of relapse
the feeling of being connected to and valued by others
intense level of elation that can impair one’s ability to function normally and may necessitate hospitalization to ensure the safety of the individual and others
limited or inconsistent access to the amount of food required to live a healthy lifestyle
a type of $$small-scale$$ living facility that, in addition to housing, provides support, supervision, and other types of assistance
